tweet: You can now integrate Hyperledger Fabric with the #IOTA Tangle! Learn how the IOTA connectors work and get the source-code files to implement multiple scenarios of the IOTA integration in a common supply chain project:  https://t.co/UqKmDWt2Ep #supplychain

Another serious step by #IOTA towards adoption: an #interoperability layer with #Hyperledger. Through this, Smart Contracts in Hyperledger can trigger actions (e.g. payments) and retrieve information from the IOTA Tangle. This opens up endless opportunities for new applications.

Co-creating Impact with EIT Climate KIC and IOTA – We want to hear your ideas on how technology and the #IOTA protocol can drive the emergence of new, long-term sustainable practices & value-chains. Read about it and share your idea:  https://t.co/p7cdxoAq1A @ClimateKIC
Welcome Alexander Schmidt to the IOTA Foundation  https://t.co/Zjm4PmMr60 #IOTA #WelcometoIOTA
Really excited to involve the amazing #IOTA Community in our work with Climate KIC. Let's build towards a more sustainable future together! #ClimateAction @ClimateKIC

The 5th episode of the #AutomationSeries is out! Richard Soley, from our Supervisory Board and Chairman & CEO of @ObjectMgmtGroup, discusses the creation of standards for technology & the integration of IoT and DLT. Visit:  https://t.co/DKQCbdXt6G. #IOTA @richardsoley @APompliano

It's always a pleasure to listen to @richardsoley discuss standardization in the context of our work at the #IOTA Foundation. Becoming open-source and open-standard is key to global adoption 🤖 @APompliano @BlockWorksGroup #TheAutomationSeries

This is the 5th episode in the Automation Series, which is sponsored by @iotatoken #IOTA   The series explores the intersection of automation, digital currencies, and machine-to-machine transactions.  You can learn more here:  https://t.co/7bIJvaZzY6
